summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 3rd Avenue North, from a connection with the existing pavement on Bigelow Avenue North to Galer Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7549 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
